mapper.select: SELECT p.FG_POST_ID,p.FG_POST_TITLE, cu.FG_USER_ID, b.FG_BUSINESS_NAME, p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT FROM FG_INQUIRY i JOIN FG_POST p ON i.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID JOIN FG_COMMON_USER cu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_SELLER s ON p.FG_USER_CODE = s.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_BUSINESS b ON p.FG_USER_CODE = b.FG_USER_CODE ORDER BY p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC --최신 문의글 순

SELECT p.FG_POST_TITLE, uf.FG_USER_FILE_ROOT,uf.FG_USER_FILE_NAME,uf.FG_USER_FILE_UUID, cu.FG_USER_ID, b.FG_BUSINESS_NAME, p.FG_POST_CREATED_AT, i.FG_INQUIRY_STATUS, i.FG_INQUIRY_CONTENT FROM FG_INQUIRY i JOIN FG_POST p ON i.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID JOIN FG_USER_FILE uf ON p.FG_USER_CODE = uf.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_COMMON_USER cu ON p.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE JOIN FG_BUSINESS b ON cu.FG_USER_CODE = b.FG_USER_CODE WHERE i.FG_POST_ID = #{fgPostId}

SELECT c.FG_POST_ID, c.FG_COMMENT_DATE, c.FG_COMMENT_CONTENT, CASE WHEN c.FG_COMMENT_EDIT = '0' THEN ' ' WHEN c.FG_COMMENT_EDIT = '1' THEN '수정됨' END AS isEdited FROM FG_COMMENT c, FG_POST p, FG_COMMON_USER cu WHERE c.FG_POST_ID = p.FG_POST_ID AND c.FG_USER_CODE = cu.FG_USER_CODE AND c.FG_POST_ID = #{fgPostId}
